algorithm_technique: Stack-based parsing to validate tag nesting and content.
problem_summary_simple: Validate if a given code snippet string follows specific XML-like tag rules.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a stack to parse tags, validating tag names, content, and CDATA sections according to strict rules.
key_insights: A stack is crucial for managing nested tags and ensuring proper opening/closing.
Handling CDATA sections requires special logic to ignore tag-like content within them.
The problem involves careful state management and character-by-character parsing.
